document.heading: Abatement of Nuisance Construction Project Amendment Temporary Act of 2005

history.narrative: Law 16-4, the “Abatement of Nuisance Construction Project Amendment Temporary Act of 2005”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-101, and was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 1, 2005, and March 1, 2005, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 17, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 16-49 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-4 became effective on May 14, 2005.
